Name: Sindy Cuarda
Description:
Sindy was shot multiple times in the early hours of Tuesday 1st October several hours after she had been seen working on a nearby street.

Her murder remains unsolved.

> In San Pablo, 24-year-old Sindy Segura was shot to death at 1:48 a.m. on Oct. 1, 2003. Her body was found near the railroad tracks that border Richmond's Iron Triangle. She was last seen the evening before working a nearby street. She had been shot in the groin, the neck and one arm, said Detective Sgt. Mark Foisie of the San Pablo Police Department. The case was suspended this past spring for lack of new leads, he said.

https://www.sfgate.com/bayarea/article/Transgender-killings-an-investigative-quagmire-2568944.php

https://iambecauseweare.files.wordpress.com/2007/05/50u30.pdf
Tweet:
Sindy Cuarda was shot in the street in San Pablo, California (USA) in the early hours of 1 Oct 2003.

She was 24. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Adrian Torres de Assuncao
Description: Adrian was bludgeoned and dumped alongsite the road. No other information is known.

Name: Erika Johana
Description:
Erika was beaten with a blunt object which shattered her skull.

Name: Rider Orcero
Description:
Ride was hogtied, then suffered a beating to the face which broke her nose. She was then strangled to death.
